sentences.en: Basic to any analysis of categorical data is a consideration of how the data was collected.
sentences.cn: 任何范畴数据分析的基础在于考虑数据是怎样收集的.

sentences.en: Conclusion It is preferable to analyse after transforming categorical variable into dummy variables.
sentences.cn: 结论将分类变量转化为哑变量分析是比较合理的方法.

sentences.en: Explain the categorical imperative. What is the meaning of categorical?
sentences.cn: 解释绝对命令. 这里“绝对”有什么意义?

sentences.en: He has gone wiggle - waggle and cannot be persuaded to categorical.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫不决,无法劝他持明确的态度.

sentences.en: Here, categorical, states of affairs , etc. all belong to self - givenness.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 范畴形式 、 事态等都成了自身给予性.

sentences.en: Kiosks generally fall into two categorical types: transactional and explorational.
sentences.cn: 信息亭一般分成两类,即交易型和探索型.

sentences.en: Objective To sump up and extend COX regression model with categorical variables.
sentences.cn: 目的总结和推广包含分类变量的COX模型.

sentences.en: Performance - Based Logistics Affordability: Can We Afford Categorical Conversion to Performance - Based Acquisition?
sentences.cn: 基于性能的后期的可承受性: 能否担负得起向基于性能的采办的无条件的转变?

sentences.en: The categorical grammar proposed by Ades and Steedman is studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究Ades和steedman提出 的范畴文法.

sentences.en: The judgement was harsh and categorical.
sentences.cn: 这个说法是够尖刻的,够干脆的.

sentences.en: The overall result is that no categorical statements can be made.
sentences.cn: 整体结论是,我们无法下明确的断言.

sentences.en: The two sides express their categorical opposition to the weaponisation and arms race in outer space.
sentences.cn: 双方明确反对外空武器化和外空军备竞赛.

sentences.en: Thus, our map would also include categorical topics such as hardware, software and data structures.
sentences.cn: 因而我们的图也包括类别主题,如硬件 、 软件和数据结构.

sentences.en: To classify ( a book or publication, for example ) according to a categorical system.
sentences.cn: 分类根据编制的体系来分类 ( 如书或刊物 )

sentences.en: You are the categorical uncatogrerised, thinking out of the box is your modus operandi.
sentences.cn: 你是个不能被分类的类别, 另类思维是你的操作模式.

words.tran_cn: 绝对的（名词categoricalness，副词categorically，异体字categoric）；直接了当的；无条件的；属于某一范畴的

trans.tran_cn: 绝对的，无条件的，分类的，按类别的，断言的，确信无疑的
trans.tran_en: a categorical statement is a clear statement that something is definitely true or false
